meanings.sent1: The income from his job is taxable.
meanings.sent2: The house he bought is taxable under the new law.
meanings.sent3: Even his lemonade stand profits are taxable!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as taxable as the sun's warmth.
meanings.sent5: The idea of taxes being unavoidable is as clear as taxable income.

meanings.sent1: All properties are taxable by the government.
meanings.sent2: The new business venture is taxable according to the regulations.
meanings.sent3: His collection of rare stamps is surprisingly taxable.
meanings.sent4: The air around us seems taxable with possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time is as taxable as any other resource.
